participant_1.name: Luke
participant_1.personality: Friendly and optimistic, he enjoys spending time outdoors and cherishes family.
participant_1.background: my daughter is a child prodigy. i'm a doctor. my favorite movie is friday. i am now looking for a new job. i enjoy going to the park.

participant_2.name: Ethan
participant_2.personality: Curious and adventurous, he loves to explore new abilities and is passionate about his health.
participant_2.background: since the surgery i've had strange powers. i can move objects with my mind. i had to have a transplant. i'm a boy. i was born with my heart outside my body.
